programme.desc: After the government demonetises currency worth Rs 500 and Rs 1000, Manmohan gets worried as he has Rs 50 lacs in cash at home. Meanwhile, Anita is delighted with the governmental decision.

programme.desc: When a prominent police negotiator is accused of corruption, he takes people hostage to buy himself time and search for evidence that will clear his name.

programme.title: Wild For The Night
programme.desc: When an ex-convict returns home to solve his sister's murder, the authority forces him to go undercover to help them bust illegal activities at a nightclub.

programme.title: Mune
programme.desc: When a group of evildoers steal the sun, the guardians of the moon and the sun set out on a journey to fight against the group and retrieve the sun.

programme.title: Fallen
programme.desc: Detective John Hobbes witnesses the execution of a demonic serial killer, Edgar Reese. However, the killings resume and are very similar to the style of Reese.

programme.title: Disciples Of The 36th Chamber
programme.desc: A Shaolin monk attempts to change the habits of a brash young troublemaker, Sai-Yuk. Though Sai-Yuk manages to leave the temple at night, he falls into the trap of a malicious governor.

programme.title: Sonic the Hedgehog
programme.desc: An extraterrestrial hedgehog is discovered by a scientist with evil intentions and plans to use his superpowers for his selfish needs.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda
programme.desc: When Po the Panda, a kung fu enthusiast, gets selected as the Dragon Warrior, he decides to team up with the Furious Five and destroy the evil forces that threaten the Valley of Peace.

programme.title: Aliens in the Attic
programme.desc: While holidaying with their family, a group of children discover that their vacation home is riddled with aliens who intend to conquer Earth using a mind-control weapon.

programme.title: Mirrors
programme.desc: Ben guards a partly destroyed property during the nights but begins to see strange images in its impeccable mirrors. After his sister is killed, he is convinced that evil forces are out to get him.

programme.title: TMNT
programme.desc: Follows the adventures of the four teenage mutated turtles gifted in the art of the ninja, as they attempt to stop a mysterious evil that threatens to end the world.

programme.title: Men In Black 3
programme.desc: Agent J of the Men in Black goes back in time to prevent the assassination of his partner, Agent K, at the hands of an alien criminal named Boris the Animal.

programme.title: Taken 2
programme.desc: During a holiday with his ex-wife, retired CIA operative Bryan Mills faces the wrath of the father of one of the kidnappers he murdered while rescuing his daughter.

programme.title: Vampires Suck
programme.desc: A teenager must choose between a vampire and a werewolf, both of whom try to woo her. To make matters worse, she must deal with her controlling father and a group of killer vampires on the loose.

programme.title: Flower Shop Mystery: Snipped In The Bud
programme.desc: Abby happens to meet her old rival while delivering a bouquet of roses ordered by an anonymous person. However, things get worse when the man is later found dead and all evidence points to Abby.

programme.title: Peninsula
programme.desc: A former soldier along with his teammates sets out on a mission to battle hordes of post-apocalyptic zombies in the Korean peninsula wastelands.

programme.title: Hotel Mumbai
programme.desc: A hotel staff risks everything to keep its patrons safe during a terror attack, especially a British heiress, her husband and her infant.

programme.title: Fight To the Finish
programme.desc: Sean, an amateur fighter, interferes in the personal life of a hardened criminal. When the criminal threatens his life, Sean decides to settle the matter in a fighting tournament.

programme.title: Vanguard
programme.desc: Qin, an accountant living in the UK, is targeted by the leader of a terrorist organisation. His only hope for survival is Vanguard, an elite security company.

programme.title: Hailey Dean Mystery: 2 + 2 = Murder
programme.desc: On the night of a school fundraiser, Naomi Sacks, a teacher, goes missing, and Hailey Dean probes an investigation to find the root of the mystery.

programme.title: A Cowgirl's Story
programme.desc: Dusty Rhodes lives with her grandfather as both her parents are overseas fighting in the Afghanistan war. Things take an unexpected turn when her mother goes missing during the war.

programme.title: Bermuda Tentacles
programme.desc: The US Navy sends its best team to the Bermuda Triangle to rescue the president. However, they awaken a monster that becomes a danger to mankind.

programme.title: Angel Of Death
programme.desc: Eve, an assassin working for organised crime, suffers a head injury that leads to her being haunted by her past victims. The spirits drive her to seek revenge against those who ordered their deaths.

programme.title: Les Miserables
programme.desc: Jean Valjean, an ex-convict who goes on to become the mayor, comes face-to-face with inspector Javert, who is on a quest to nab him for his past deeds.

programme.title: Gladiator
programme.desc: After moving to Chicago, USA, with his father, Tommy, a young man, enters the world of underground boxing in order to help pay off his father's debts.

programme.title: Hanna
programme.desc: Hanna, a 16-year-old who is raised by her father to be the perfect assassin, goes on a mission which takes her across Europe. However, she must avoid being captured by Marissa, a ruthless CIA agent.

programme.title: Destined To Ride
programme.desc: Lily, a teenager, is forced to spend the summer on her aunt's ranch and finds herself bonding with a horse, Pistachio. When the neighbours create trouble, it is up to them to take care of things.

programme.title: Big Fish
programme.desc: A young man returns home to care for his dying father, who had a penchant for telling unbelievable stories and after he passes away, he tries to find out if his tales were really true.

programme.title: The Big Hit
programme.desc: Hitman Melvin Smiley's loyalties are put to the test when he falls in love with Keiko Nishi, a young woman he has kidnapped in order to get a hefty ransom.

programme.title: Flower Shop Mystery: Mum's the Word
programme.desc: Abby's vintage car gets damaged when it is hit by a reckless driver. She teams up with Marco, a former private investigator, to find the culprit.

programme.title: Flower Shop Mystery: Dearly Depotted
programme.desc: Abby Knight, a flower shop owner, who happens to be an ex-attorney, investigates the murder of an unwanted wedding crasher.

programme.title: Vanguard
programme.desc: Qin, an accountant living in the UK, is targeted by the leader of a terrorist organisation. His only hope for survival is Vanguard, an elite security company.

programme.title: Bermuda Tentacles
programme.desc: The US Navy sends its best team to the Bermuda Triangle to rescue the president. However, they awaken a monster that becomes a danger to mankind.

programme.title: Peninsula
programme.desc: A former soldier along with his teammates sets out on a mission to battle hordes of post-apocalyptic zombies in the Korean peninsula wastelands.

programme.title: Hailey Dean Mystery: A Marriage Made for Murder
programme.desc: Hailey Dean, a former prosecutor, along with her team of detectives, investigates the murder of an art dealer who died due to poisoning.

programme.title: If Lucy Fell
programme.desc: Joe and Lucy are best friends and roommates. Surprising events follow their decision to jump off the Brooklyn Bridge if they both don't find true love by the time Lucy turns 30.

programme.title: My Girl
programme.desc: Vada, a hypochondriac, becomes distraught when her father, a widower, begins dating Shelly, a makeup artist, and attempts to disrupt their relationship.

programme.title: Excess Baggage
programme.desc: Emily fakes her own kidnapping in order to get her father's attention. She locks herself in the trunk of a car, but the situation changes when a thief steals the car with her inside.

programme.title: Bingo
programme.desc: Little Chuckie and Bingo form an instant bond after the dog saves the boy's life. However, when Chuckie's family moves across the country, Bingo sets off to reunite with his friend.

programme.title: Stealing Harvard
programme.desc: John Plummer ventures into the world of crime when he needs to raise money for his niece's admission to Harvard University. However, things turn awry after the police pursue the conman.

programme.title: Man Of The Year
programme.desc: Tom Dobbs, a news anchor, contests the presidential elections. When he manages to win, he is shocked. However, unknown to him, he owes his win to a technical glitch.

programme.title: City Of Hope
programme.desc: After quitting his contractor's job, Nick Rinaldi pursues a life of petty crime and love. Meanwhile, an idealistic politician is torn between the truth and politics.

programme.title: Once Upon a Time In Hollywood
programme.desc: Rick, a washed-out actor, and Cliff, his stunt double, struggle to recapture fame and success in 1960s Los Angeles. In their mission, they must tackle several twists and turns.

programme.title: Chal Mere Bhai
programme.desc: A standoffish businessman grieving the death of his girlfriend, falls in love with a vivacious girl working in his office, unaware of the fact that his younger brother is deeply in love with her too.

programme.title: Nakshatra
programme.desc: Ajay a writer shares his script with four producers. Around the same time, a robbery takes place. Ajay is accused of the robbery as the plot of the robbery in his script matches the actual robbery that took place. How will Ajay prove his innocence?

programme.title: Guddu Ki Gun
programme.desc: A washing powder salesman, Guddu, finds himself in a quandary when his girlfriend's grandfather casts a spell on him after he ditches her. Guddu must now find true love and stay loyal to her in order to get rid of the curse.

programme.title: Chal Mere Bhai
programme.desc: A standoffish businessman grieving the death of his girlfriend, falls in love with a vivacious girl working in his office, unaware of the fact that his younger brother is deeply in love with her too.

programme.title: Husn Aur Talwar
programme.desc: Sapna lands in Mumbai to earn fame as an actress. As she tries to get work in the Hindi film industry, she is asked for sexual favours. Unable to find another option, she falls into the trap of wrong people which includes a well-known star Aman. One day, Sapna discovers that she's suffering from a deadly disease and faces the biggest challenge of her life.

programme.title: Bach Ke Zara
programme.desc: A group of students on a vacation get trapped in a deserted house of an archaeologist who possesses some unusual powers.

programme.title: The Legend of Bhagat Singh
programme.desc: During the British Raj, upon witnessing the atrocities of the British, Bhagat Singh grows up to be a fierce freedom fighter. His publicised ideas of revolution bring him to as much popularity as Mahatma Gandhi amongst Indians.

programme.title: Ekkees Tareekh Shubh Muhurat
programme.desc: A 55-year-old aspiring storyteller wanting to escape his family legacy of becoming a priest. His dream comes true in an unexpected way, when he is jailed and he finds an audience amongst the prisoners.

programme.title: Heyy Babyy
programme.desc: Aarush, Al and Tanmay, three womanisers get the shock of their life when they find a baby girl at their doorstep claiming to be the daughter of one of them. As they try to find her mother, they discover an unexplored side of their own personality.

programme.title: Bumm Bumm Bole
programme.desc: Pinu, a young boy, misplaces his sister, Rimzim's shoes at a vegetable shop. However, in fear of their parents, Pinu asks Rimzim to share his pair of shoes until their father can afford new ones.

programme.title: Hotel Milan
programme.desc: Vipul and his friends come up with a radical business idea for a hotel that attracts young unmarried couples and all hell breaks loose in a conservative town of Uttar Pradesh.

programme.title: Heyy Babyy
programme.desc: Aarush, Al and Tanmay, three womanisers get the shock of their life when they find a baby girl at their doorstep claiming to be the daughter of one of them. As they try to find her mother, they discover an unexplored side of their own personality.

programme.title: Karar: The Deal
programme.desc: Aryan, a doctor, and Annie, a nurse, work as caretakers for an old man. To execute his and Annie's plan to embezzle the old man's wealth, Aryan marries Nikita, the old man's granddaughter. But she soon discovers their intentions.

programme.title: Ashley
programme.desc: When Ronit abandons his girlfriend Ashley a drug dealer and moves to Mumbai to chase his dreams the latter frames him for a murder in order to seek revenge.

programme.title: Doli Saja Ke Rakhna
programme.desc: Two star-crossed lovers are prompted to elope when the girl's burly brothers refuse to let them live in peace. But the overwhelmed youngsters start second guessing their decision when they see life for what it is.​

programme.title: Saath Saath
programme.desc: Avinash, working a day job at his friend's publishing house, does not believe in chasing riches. But when his wife gets pregnant, the financial crunches start to drift Avinash away from his values.

programme.title: FAQing Around With a Raelian
programme.desc: A long time ago in a galaxy far far away, a gathering of people believed in a UFO race of super-humans. We spoke to Rishi Gangoly a Raelian from Mumbai to find out more about this alien race that apparently created all life on Earth. The first in our series, FAQing Around With...

programme.title: Episode 19 | Chappal Nahin, Chill Maro
programme.desc: This Week In Food, the boys show you how to beat the heat without losing your cool or using your chappal like Ravindra Gaikwad. They put together an Ahin-salad and Calm Panna for our angry flyers, Gaikwad and Kapil Sharma.

programme.title: Episode 13 | Valentine’s Day Special
programme.desc: This Week In Food, love is in the air. The boys dish up a tasty-as-f**k Mushroom Ragout and some spiced saffron Sangh-Riya that will help the Valentines Day vigilantes to keep calm

programme.title: The Farm Life | Episode 4
programme.desc: Aaj mosambi bada beimaan hai! Join Shagun as she whips up a fresh, zingy ceviche and a refreshingly tangy sweet-lime mojito

programme.title: The Farm Life | Episode 1
programme.desc: chef Shagun Mehra and her charm, and drop them off at the farm. She whips up some tasty mango treats right there

programme.title: The Farm Life | Fresh Fruit Chaat
programme.desc: The Farm Life has a mixed bag of oranges and lemons for you

programme.title: The Farm Life | Episode 2
programme.desc: Youve heard of going bananas but this time Shaguns going guavas in search of this fruit. Join her as she visits yet another farm and whips up a tasty treat

programme.title: Episode 2 | Steven Spielberg Versus Indie Cameraman
programme.desc: The KJo vs Tarantino squabble continues, struggle to make the worlds most viral video. An indie filmmaker makes a special appearance.

programme.title: Episode 4 | From Russia Without Love
programme.desc: Abbaas and Mastan seem to have finally found someone to shoot their viral video, a Russian journalist. But she has other plans.

programme.title: Official CEOgiri Episode 4
programme.desc: “Coat ka asteen jitna bada hoga, saanpo ke chipne ke liye jagah bhi utni zyaada hogi.” Kaun hai Dilawar Rana ke asteen ka saanp?

programme.title: Official Bhootiyagiri Season 3 Episode 4
programme.desc: The mansion’s past and his childhood memories haunt Dilawar more than the apparent demons outside. Tired of the constant struggle and the inability to face the place that started his anxiety disorder, Dilawar decides to sell the mansion and shut down the hotel. However, a heartfelt conversation with his father leads to a change in his heart. Will this reunion turn into something fruitful? Will this save the family property from getting sold?

programme.title: Episode 5 | Season Finale
programme.desc: Season Finale

programme.title: Khuda Gawah
programme.desc: Baadshah Khan falls in love with Benazir, a member of a rival clan who has defeated him in a game of Buzkashi. Benazir will not marry him unless he brings back the head of her father's killer, Habibullah, from India.

programme.title: Mastana
programme.desc: A man befriends a neglected child from a wealthy family but her parents resent their friendship and stop her from seeing him. However, when she falls ill, only he can help her recover.

programme.title: Mohabbat 1985
programme.desc: When Shekhar falls for Roopa, he approaches her father with his parents. However, when his stepmother asks Roopa's father for dowry, he vows to marry his daughter elsewhere.

programme.title: Aanchal
programme.desc: The pure, selfless, and strong bond between Shambu and his sister-in-law Shanti is misunderstood by their family and the society, leading them to face many trials that threaten to split the family.

programme.title: Anupama
programme.desc: Uma, the only daughter of Mohan, grows up to be an introverted woman as her father despises her. She lands up in a great dilemma after she falls in love with Ashok, a poet.

programme.title: Apna Bana Lo
programme.desc: After losing his parents at a young age, Master is raised by a gangster who teaches him the tricks of his criminal trade. However, when Master adopts a child, he decides to give up on crime.

programme.title: Avtaar
programme.desc: Avtaar leads a happy life with his wife, Radha, and his sons, Chander and Ramesh. However, consumed by their greed and ambitions, Avtaar's sons betray him but he soon reaches new heights of success.

programme.title: Banphool
programme.desc: Haria and Gulabi, who are in love, plan to get married to each other, much to the chagrin of Ajay. However, things take a turn when Ajay plans to get Haria killed.

programme.title: Betaab
programme.desc: When Sunny meets his childhood friend Roma, cupid strikes. But Roma's father disapproves of their union and decides to separate them.

programme.title: Ek Chitthi Pyar Bhari
programme.desc: A doctor puts out a job posting to recruit a nurse for his clinics in rural India. Unaware of a candidate's dark past, he hires her and eventually falls in love with her.

programme.title: Hum Hain Rahi Pyar Ke
programme.desc: Rahul looks after his spoilt nephews, Sunny and Vicky, and niece, Munni. When they go to a funfair, they meet Vyjayanti, who has run away from home, and decide to shelter her without Rahul's consent.

programme.title: Hum Intezaar Karenge
programme.desc: Manisha, a wealthy woman, falls in love with Ajay, a middle-class man, who promises to marry her and settle down within three years. However, after the time period passes, he mysteriously disappears.

programme.title: Kasam
programme.desc: A police officer infiltrates a gang of bandits and attempts to reform them, but he is double crossed and framed for murder.

programme.title: Nastik
programme.desc: Following his father's murder a poor kid is grown to be a criminal. One day he meets his mother and sister and try to hide him being a criminal.

programme.title: Naya Kadam
programme.desc: In a village ruled by Madhukar and Jaggu, who deprive the people of education so they can easily oppress them, Ramu manages to educate himself secretly with the help of a school teacher.

programme.title: Pakeezah
programme.desc: Sahibjaan, a courtesan, and Salim Ahmed Khan, a forest ranger, fall in love with each other. However, her aunt and an obsessive patron stand in the way of her true happiness.

programme.title: Pathar Ke Insan
programme.desc: Talented sisters, Sita and Lata, are renowned performing artists. However, the rivalry between them leads to a competition with far-reaching consequences.

programme.title: Sachai Ki Taqat
programme.desc: Sagar sets out to exact revenge against Dr Narendra, a smuggler who killed his father. However, when he gets framed and imprisoned, Havaldar Ram Singh helps him prove his innocence.

programme.title: Sawan Bhadon
programme.desc: Vikram, a wealthy man, is killed by his greedy stepmother Sulochana and his sister's lover Madan for interfering with their plans. However, they are shocked when Vikram appears unharmed.

programme.title: Veerey Ki Wedding
programme.desc: Veer and Geet fall in love with each other and want to get married. However, they face an obstacle after Geet's peace-loving father sees Veer getting involved in a fight to protect a girl.

programme.title: Barsaat 2005
programme.desc: Arav, an ambitious married man, travels to the US to seek better opportunities. There, Anna, whose grandfather offers Arav to work with him for automobile giants, falls in love with him.

programme.title: Aan Men At Work
programme.desc: DCP Patnaik has to encounter immorality and corruptions in the police forces he is serving and over come the mistrust of his colleagues.

programme.title: Ahista Ahista
programme.desc: For a fee of Rs.200/- Ankush Ramdev provides four witnesses to couples who come to register their marriages at the Registrar of Marriages in Dariyaganj, Delhi.

programme.title: SP Chauhan
programme.desc: Satpal Chauhan, a social worker from Haryana, works for women empowerment and also strives to create an alcohol-free society. However, while pursuing his goals, he faces several hardships.

programme.title: Shaadi Ke Patasey
programme.desc: Two people fall in love with each other but are unable to express their feelings. Things take a turn when their parents fix their wedding with other individuals.

programme.title: Shaadi Teri Bajayenge Hum Band
programme.desc: The story mainly builds on confusion and how that creates a huge humorous ruckus that will leave its audience in splits.

programme.title: Sharmaji Ki Lag Gayi
programme.desc: Professor Sharma, a prude man, writes columns for a weekly newspaper about issues related to sex. Things get chaotic in his life when his wife, Shobha, gets eve-teased by a criminal named Lallan.

programme.title: Speed
programme.desc: An undercover agent receives a CD which contains the recording of his kidnapped wife, and is asked to kill the Prime Minister.

programme.title: Superstar
programme.desc: Ever since he was 8 years of age, Kunal Mehra wanted to act in Bollywood movies much to his dad's displeasure. but has been not very successful in landing any major part in any movie.

programme.title: Tera Intezaar
programme.desc: A woman sets out to uncover how her lover went missing.

programme.title: Toh Baat Pakki
programme.desc: A pushy busybody invites a young man to be her tenant, in hopes of arranging a marriage for her younger sister; but then has to get rid off him when she believes she has found an even better match. With Tabu and Sharman Joshi. 2010.

programme.title: Traffic Signal
programme.desc: Silsila, a street smart young man, manages the various trades practised at a traffic signal in Mumbai. However, his world comes crashing down when he unknowingly aids in executing a murder.

programme.title: Uvaa
programme.desc: Worried about their future, five wayward teens from remote villages in UP are enrolled in an English medium school in Faridabad by their respective families in order to reform them. But can the youngsters adapt to their new posh surroundings?

programme.title: Veerey Ki Wedding
programme.desc: Veer and Geet fall in love with each other and want to get married. However, they face an obstacle after Geet's peace-loving father sees Veer getting involved in a fight to protect a girl.

programme.title: Scotland
programme.desc: A daughter has been sexually assaulted by four thugs. The courts acquit the defendants and so the grieving father decides to take justice into his own hands in a premeditated revenge plot that has a price of its own.

programme.title: Shaadi Ka Laddoo
programme.desc: Som, a married man, travels to Britain to meet his childhood friend, Ravi. However, their lives get complicated when they both start envying each other's good fortune.

programme.title: Shaadi Ke Patasey
programme.desc: Two people fall in love with each other but are unable to express their feelings. Things take a turn when their parents fix their wedding with other individuals.

programme.title: Shaadi Teri Bajayenge Hum Band
programme.desc: The story mainly builds on confusion and how that creates a huge humorous ruckus that will leave its audience in splits.

programme.title: Deadline: Sirf 24 Ghante
programme.desc: A well known Doctor is force to pay rancom for his daughter. When he hands over a large suitcase with the money he got sprays in his eyes and the kidnaper getting a way. Will he see his daughter a live again?

programme.title: Kya Yehi Pyaar Hai
programme.desc: A college slacker pursues the girl of his dreams and will do just about anything to get her to like him.
